## PageEventProps.urlPattern property

A URL that can contain wildcards.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
urlPattern: string;
```

## Remarks

For example, `https://samelogic.com/*\/docs` matches all URLs that contain `samelogic.com` and end with `/docs`<!-- -->.
